userPage: This is your profile page. Here you can update your details or delete your account completely.

all.pro: create boards for your projects with description
create columns with any title you want
create tasks in each column and assign teammates to tasks
rearrange tasks within one column or even between columns
create unlimited number of projects, columns ans tasks
free a lot of time to work with your projects

teammates.name: Uladzimir
teammates.did: Sign-In/Sign-Up and Profile pages, localization, burger-menu, sticky header, styles

teammates.name: Aliaksandr
teammates.did: Welcome, Boards and Single-board pages, modal forms, drag'n'drop, private/public routes, API calls

main.question: Don't know what to do next and what your teammates responsible for?
main.answer: With the Project Tracker you can effectively manage your projects, share with teammates, make a plan of your work and control all stages of your project.
main.stack: Our app created as a final project of course RS School React 2022 Q3 with a stack of technologies
main.feedback: Try Project Tracker and leave us a feedback!

confirmation.board: You want to delete this board. This will also delete all columns and all tasks in this board. Are you sure?
confirmation.column: You want to delete this column with all tasks in it. Are you sure?
confirmation.task: You want to delete this task. Are you sure?
confirmation.user: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

login.validChars: can contain only latin letters, digits and underscore
login.firstLetter: should begin from letter or digit

name.validChars: can contain only letters, space and dash

password.oneDigit: should contain at least one digit
password.oneLowercase: should contain at least one lowercase letter
password.oneUppercase: should contain at least one capital letter
password.oneSpecialChar: should contain at least one special character

errorPage.errorText: or any button. And if you want, you can even click on the logo!
